code: import React from'react';import Navbar from'./NavbarHome';import Button from'react-bootstrap/Button';import $ from'jquery';import'../css/App.css';import{useEffect}from'react';import colorspectrum from'../images/Spectrum.png';import exampleImage from'../images/Cat.png';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Home=function Home(){useEffect(function(){createPixelMask();},[]);var navigate=useNavigate();function createPixelMask(){var table=document.getElementById("pixel_Table");var row;var cell;for(var i=0;i<5;i++){row=table.insertRow(i);for(var j=0;j<5;j++){cell=row.insertCell(j);cell.addEventListener('click',clickHandlerColumn);cell.addEventListener('contextmenu',resetOpacity);}}document.getElementById("pixel_Table").style.backgroundImage='url('+exampleImage+')';}function resetOpacity(event){event.preventDefault();$(event.target).css("opacity",".0");}function clickHandlerColumn(event){var opacity_level=parseFloat($(event.target).css("opacity"));if(opacity_level=="0.9"){$(event.target).css("opacity",".0");}else{opacity_level=opacity_level+0.15;$(event.target).css("opacity",opacity_level);}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{height:"40vw",position:"relative"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{position:"absolute",top:"50%",left:"50%",transform:"translate(-50%, -50%)",textAlign:"center"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Example Image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:["Left click on a pixel to mark it's importance. ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})," You can right click to reset the pixel's opacity back to 0%"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("table",{id:"pixel_Table"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("figure",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:colorspectrum,alt:"Spectrum"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("figcaption",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:"Degree of importance (dark green indicates high importance)"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline-secondary",onClick:function onClick(){navigate('/survey');},children:"Start Survey"})]})})]});};export default Home;
